existingProfile.prefix: If you already have a profile please

noProfile.prefix: If you don't have a profile please

messages.timeout: Keys not responding, check your key storage app
messages.profileWarning: Your profile may be lost if you close this tab

nlConfirmLogout.title: Logout
nlConfirmLogout.description: Are you sure you want to log out?

nlIframe.description: Your profile keys are stored in this browser tab and will be deleted if you log out, and your profile will be inaccessible.

description.intro: Nostr profiles are controlled by cryptographic keys.
description.warning: Your keys are currently only stored in this browser tab, and may be lost if you close it.
description.recommendation: We recommend to import your keys into a key store service, to protect them and to use with other apps.

description.copy: Copy your keys and store them in a safe place, like a password manager.
description.signIn: You can sign into other Nostr apps by pasting your keys into them.
description.warning: Your keys must be kept secret, never share them with anyone.

serviceSelection.description: Your Nostr keys will be imported into the service you choose. You will manage your keys on their website.
serviceSelection.defaultProvider: Default provider is a fine choice to start with.

connecting.title: Connecting...
connecting.text: Establishing connection to your key storage.

confirming.title: Confirming...
confirming.text: Please confirm the connection in your key storage app.

ready.title: Almost ready!
ready.text: Continue to confirm the connection to your key storage.

nlLocalSignup.description: Choose any username, you can always change it later.
nlLocalSignup.descriptionNjump: Proceed to creating your Nostr profile in a new tab.

nlOtpMigrate.textImport: You will be prompted to import keys to the chosen service, and this website will connect to your keys.
nlOtpMigrate.defaultProvider: Default provider is a fine choice to start with.
